org.melior.client.activemq

Class ActiveMQClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.melior.client.core.ClientConfig
      • org.melior.client.activemq.ActiveMQClientConfig
        • org.melior.client.activemq.ActiveMQClient

  • public class ActiveMQClient
extends ActiveMQClientConfig
    Implements an easy to use, auto-configuring ActiveMQ client with connection pooling, configurable backoff strategy and automatic object mapping.

    The client writes timing details to the logs while dispatching JMS messages to the ActiveMQ server. The client automatically converts any exception that occurs during communication with the ActiveMQ server into a standard RemotingException.

    Since:
    2.3
    Author:
    Melior
